course_name: Rural and Remote Nursing: Foundations of Practice
description: This foundational course is designed to introduce the student to the rural and remote context of nursing practice. Historical, geographic, demographic, cultural, socio-economic and technological factors and their influence on the provision of health care by nurses and the allied health team are explored along with the concepts of nurse specialist versus generalist practice.
restricted: Grad Cert in Nursing, Grad Dip in Nursing, MN students, MNPracSt students
